text: hi can you tell us a little bit about why you came in today
Hey. Well, I've been feeling worn out all the time. My legs swell up pretty bad, and I feel sick most days. My girlfriend's been worried, so I figured I'd better get checked out.
do you remember when your symptoms started
I guess it started getting worse after I stopped working. It's been a while now, but I can't pinpoint exactly when it all began.
when did you stop working
I stopped working a few months ago. Just couldn't keep up with the plumbing jobs anymore.
what did the doctor tell you the last time you came in
They said they needed to run more tests. I didn't get much else from them at the time.
did you follow up or get those tests
Yeah, I've been in and out for tests. Still waiting to hear back on some of them.
what tests were they do you know
I don't really know all the details. They took some blood and did a few scans, but you'd have to ask the doctors about the specifics.
can you tell us about your past medical history
Sure, I've had high blood pressure since my thirties. I also had a mild stroke a while back, but I got better from that. I've been in the hospital before for lung congestion too.
were you ever diagnosed with something having to do with your kidneys
Not that I know of. My dad had kidney problems, but I haven't been told anything about my own kidneys.
can you tell me about your dad's kidney problems
I remember my dad had high blood pressure and diabetes, and I think he had kidney disease too. He passed away young, at 45. That's about all I know.
have you been diagnosed with diabetes
No, I haven't been diagnosed with diabetes.
what other symptoms do you have
I feel nauseated most days, and everything tastes like metal. My girlfriend says my breath smells fishy, and I wake up with this white powder on my skin.
have you noticed that your urinary habits have changed
Yeah, I pee less than I used to, and sometimes it's darker. I figured maybe I'm just not drinking enough.
how much are you drinking
I try to drink water throughout the day, but probably not as much as I should. I have coffee every morning, too.
color of urine?medications?
My urine's sometimes dark. As for medications, I've got a bunch I can't pronounce. My girlfriend makes me keep a list in my wallet.
can i see the list? fatigue? pain? bruising? rashes? dyspnea, nausea? vomitting?

Sure, the list has furosemide, nifedipine, potassium chloride, clonidine patch, clopidogrel, atenolol, iron, and aspirin. I'm worn out all the time, got a deep ache in my bones, and these bruises show up on their own. I feel nauseated most days and sometimes vomit. I get short of breath when I walk too far. No rashes, but I wake up with this white powder on my skin.
skin changes?
Well, besides the white powder I wake up with, I've noticed bruises showing up for no reason. My skin itches when my legs are swollen, too.
recent sickness? kidney stones?
I haven't been sick recently, and I've never had kidney stones, as far as I know.
bone fractures? orthopnea? sleep with pillow? vision changes? wt changes? sweating? headache? dizziness? palpitations? cough? fever?

I haven't had any bone fractures. I don't sleep with extra pillows, but my girlfriend says my eyes look like they're bulging. I've lost weight without trying, and I sweat out of nowhere. I get dizzy if I stand up too fast, but no palpitations or cough. No fever either, just headaches sometimes.
how far up your leg do you notice swelling?
The swelling goes up past my knees now.
appetite?
My appetite's not great. Food doesn't sit right anymore, and everything tastes like metal.
smoking? alc? drugs? father?
I don't smoke or use drugs. I have a few beers sometimes, but not often. My dad had high blood pressure, diabetes, and kidney disease. He passed away young.
mother? anyone else experience this in the fam?
My mom had breast cancer and passed away at 60. I don't know if anyone else in the family has experienced what I'm going through right now.
pain in groin?
No, I haven't had any pain in my groin.
back pain/flank?
I haven't noticed any back or flank pain.
tetany? tremor? restless leg? asterixis? cramps?
My legs are restless at night, which drives my girlfriend crazy. I haven't noticed any tremors, tetany, or asterixis, but I do get cramps sometimes.
blood sugar?
I haven't had any issues with blood sugar that I know of.
can i talk to your girlfriend?
She's not here right now, but I can try to answer any questions you have.
hot or cold?
I feel cold sometimes and then sweat out of nowhere. It's a bit all over the place.
confusion?
Yeah, I've been getting mixed up lately. Sometimes I forget what I was doing or can't think straight.
where is the bone pain
It's a deep ache, mostly in my legs and arms, like I've been hauling pipe all day.
